name: RunCorona
description:
You are containing the virus and running to protect yourself from police and doctors.

Civilians are trying to protect themselves to not get infected by virus.

Your objective is to infect as many as civilians possible just touching them  while protecting yourself, you can't infect police or doctor.

If caught your game is not over but you spawn at the location of any infected civilian,if none then you die.

Infected civilian kills police or doctor on getting close to them.
